name: Choking Darkness
description:
My submission to the Mini Jam 103: Darkness.

You venture into the mines due to reports of an unnatural fog emanating from within. Try to survive and reach the bottom.

** KNOWN BUG(s) :**

- In the first level you can move while the tutorial is open, this only happens in the build and I don't know what's causing it or how to fix it

Use of limitation:  Blowing away the fog increases your detection and makes the monster run at you faster.  (Also the monster is a zombified version of you)

Assets Used:
Fog FX: LFA from OpenGameArt
Character Sprites: Omega Modern Graphics Pack
Tileset:  RPG Graphics Pack - Cave Tileset by 7Soul
Music: Mines from Dungeon Music Pack
